headline: Builders FirstSource (BLDR): Exploring Valuation After Sharp Analyst Downgrades and Earnings Estimate Cuts
summary: Builders FirstSource (BLDR) is on investors’ radar as the stock recently faced downward pressure, driven by lower analyst expectations for its upcoming earnings. As industry watchers brace for a year-over-year decline, market sentiment remains cautious. See our latest analysis for Builders FirstSource. Recent acquisitions in Las Vegas and continued community fundraising have been bright spots, but investor concerns about falling earnings estimates have clearly weighed on sentiment. While...

headline: Does Builders FirstSource (BLDR) Have a Long-Term Tailwind for Growth?
summary: Black Bear Value Partners, an investment management firm, published its third-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. Black Bear Value Fund returned -7.1% in September and -1.0% in the quarter, and -12.7% YTD. The S&P 500 returned +3.6% September, +8.1% in the quarter, and +14.8% year-to-date. HFRI Value Index […]

headline: Builders FirstSource to Host Third Quarter 2025 Financial Results Conference Call and Webcast
summary: IRVING, Texas, October 09, 2025--Builders FirstSource, Inc. (NYSE: BLDR) ("Builders FirstSource" or the "Company") will host a conference call and webcast on Thursday, October 30, 2025, to discuss the Company’s financial results and other business matters. The teleconference will begin at 8:00 a.m. Central Time and will be hosted by Peter Jackson, President and Chief Executive Officer, and Pete Beckmann, Chief Financial Officer.
